CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 15, 1939, pg. 7, reads: "Wednesday Bridge Club Hostesses to Beautiful Holiday Event at Loendi - Scenes at the Wednesday Bridge Club's Easter Monday party at Loendi... Right: Mrs. Agnes Stevenson, Mrs. Vivian Robinson, Mrs. Ruby Thompson, Mrs. Hattie Vaughn, Mrs. Winifred Moss, Mrs. Mary Cole Gould. Teenie Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Women, including Agnes Stevenson, Vivian Robinson, Ruby Thompson, Hattie Vaughn, Winifred Moss, and Mary Cole Gould, seated in rounded banquette and playing bridge card game in Loendi Club
